attributes.action: Send British forces to Ukraine to stop Human Rights abuses.
attributes.additional_details: Stop Russian aggression by all means necessary.
attributes.background: Debate sending British troops to Ukraine whether with Nato partners or separately as a sovereign state to prevent mass slaughter of innocent lives.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314

Urge the UN to send a UN Peacekeeping Force to Ukraine immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610630
